In England, in the seven days to 03 April, there were 20,822 new confirmed cases (37.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 March, there were 30,723 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 32% (9,901 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 April is 3,821,151 (6,788.7 cases per 100,000 population).
